original_text: Jesus is not here. He has become alive again! Remember what he said to you, while he was still with you in Galilee.
korean_text: 여기 계시지 않고 살아나셨느니라 갈릴리에 계실 때에 너희에게 어떻게 말씀하셨는지를 기억하라

sentences.original_text: Remember what he said to you
while he was still with you in Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 갈릴리에 너희와 함께 있을 때
